item.description:
Imagine engaging your community and unleashing its genius to prepare now for future economic instability, lower energy availability and changing climate?

        Scott McKeown, did exactly that!

                  

Friday, October 21, 6:30 PM in Belfast

Scott will speak and answer questions on the Transition Movement and his personal experiences as the initiator of the thriving Transition Sebastopol

After more than 3 years of volunteer effort by the initiating group, Transition Sebastopol now has a life of its own with 12 active working groups and a core coordinating group.  With the end of the initial phase of  the Transition model, Scott can now step back and choose a different role for himself.  As a trainer, he is well able to speak personally of the challenges, joys, scars and the personal satisfaction of having co-created a living social model which utilizes the collective community genius to prepare for a difficult future.

Location:  Water Fall Arts Center,  256 High St, Belfast, ME

For more info, contact:  Kim Jacobs

zephyrhill((at))fairpoint.net   Replace ((at)) with @

(207)((-))722((-))3139
item.name: Scott McKeown Speaks on Founding Transition Sebastopol, Belfast, Friday Oct 21
